nodes.text: Grease was a lubricant, used in the manufacture and upkeep of objects.
Wookiees were described by Lando Calrissian to be able to construct and repair anything, provided they possessed enough grease and transmission wire.
C-3PO once called his counterpart R2-D2 an overweight glob of grease. Used as a verb, "grease" was also commonly used as a euphemism for destruction.
